DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to examine if real time transmission of vital signs, ECG and chat communication between the prehospital ambulances and the emergency department has an effect on patient mortality, ICU admission, hospitalization time, time to doctor, time to treatment and time to diagnostics
DOC.brief_title: Mobile Transmission of Prehospital Vital Signs to the Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: All patients transported with ambulance to the emergency department
